ceiling_fan.title: Choose a ceiling fan
ceiling_fan.description:
Choose a ceiling fan to control.

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-smartify

ceiling_fan_options.title: Configure {controlled_entity}
ceiling_fan_options.description:
Automate a ceiling fan for comfort using the summer simmer index (SSI) as the comfort level. http://www.summersimmer.com/home.htm

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-smartify

data.temp_sensor: Temperature sensor in the same room as the fan to be controlled:
data.humidity_sensor: Humidity sensor in the same room as the fan to be controlled:
data.ssi_min: Fan will start when SSI is above:
data.ssi_max: Fan speed will be maximum speed when SSI above:
data.required_on_entities: The following sensors must all be 'on' for occupancy to be detected (optional):
data.required_off_entities: The following sensors must all be 'off' for occupancy to be detected (optional):

light.title: Choose a light

Choose a light to control.

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-smartify

light_options.title: Configure {controlled_entity}
light_options.description:
Automate a light based on illuminancy and required states. Everything is optional.

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-smartify

data.required_on_entities: The following sensors must all be 'on' for the light to be automatically turned on (optional):
data.required_off_entities: The following sensors must all be 'off' for the light to be automatically turned on (optional):

occupancy.title: Configure occupancy sensor
occupancy.description:
Create an occupancy sensor based on motion sensors, door sensors and other entities.

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-smartify

data.motion_sensors: Occupancy will be detected for specified minutes whenever motion is detected by any of these sensors (optional):
data.other_entities: Occupancy will be detected if any of these sensors are 'on' (optional):
data.door_sensors: Occupancy will be detected indefinitely when motion is detected in a room as long as all doors remain closed--even after motion stops. Only add door sensors when all access points in the area have sensors. Door sensors need to report quickly and cloud-based sensors should be avoided (optional):
data.required_on_entities: The following sensors must all be 'on' for occupancy to be detected (optional):
data.required_off_entities: The following sensors must all be 'off' for occupancy to be detected (optional):

error.door_needs_motion: Door sensors require motion sensors to be specified.
error.duplicate_name: An integration with the same name already exists.
error.motion_needs_minutes: Motion sensors require 'turn off after' to be specified.
error.occupancy_and_auto_off: Occupancy sensor and automatic off cannot be used together.
error.occupancy_needs_trigger: Must specify motion sensors and/or other entities.

abort.nothing_to_control: No entities are available to control
